verses.verse: And there was given <S%G1325><s%> me a measuring <S%G2563><s%> rod <S%G2563><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a staff; <S%G4464><s%> and someone said, <S%G3004><s%> "Rise <S%G1453><s%> and measure <S%G3354><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the altar, <S%G2379><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who worship <S%G4352><s%> in it.

"And leave <S%G1544><s%> out the court <S%G833><s%> which is outside <S%G1855><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> and do not measure <S%G3354><s%> it, for it has been given <S%G1325><s%> to the nations; <S%G1484><s%> and they will tread <S%G3961><s%> under <S%G3961><s%> foot <S%G3961><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> for forty-two months. <S%G3376><s%>

"And I will grant <S%G1325><s%> [authority] to my two <S%G1417><s%> witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> and they will prophesy <S%G4395><s%> for twelve <S%G5507><s%> <S%G1250><s%> hundred <S%G5507><s%> <S%G1250><s%> and sixty <S%G1835><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in sackcloth. <S%G4526><s%>"

These <S%G3778><s%> are the two <S%G1417><s%> olive <S%G1636><s%> trees <S%G1636><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> lampstands <S%G3087><s%> that stand <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> desires <S%G2309><s%> to harm <S%G91><s%> them, fire <S%G4442><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> out of their mouth <S%G4750><s%> and devours <S%G2719><s%> their enemies; <S%G2190><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> would desire <S%G2309><s%> to harm <S%G91><s%> them, in this <S%G3779><s%> manner <S%G3779><s%> he must <S%G1163><s%> be killed. <S%G615><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> to shut <S%G2808><s%> up the sky, <S%G3772><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that rain <S%G5205><s%> may not fall <S%G1026><s%> during the days <S%G2250><s%> of their prophesying; <S%G4394><s%> and they have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the waters <S%G5204><s%> to turn <S%G4762><s%> them into blood, <S%G129><s%> and to smite <S%G3960><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with every <S%G3956><s%> plague, <S%G4127><s%> as often <S%G3740><s%> as they desire. <S%G2309><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> they have finished <S%G5055><s%> their testimony, <S%G3141><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> that comes <S%G305><s%> up out of the abyss <S%G12><s%> will make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with them, and overcome <S%G3528><s%> them and kill <S%G615><s%> them.

And their dead <S%G4430><s%> bodies <S%G4430><s%> [will lie] in the street <S%G4116><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> mystically <S%G4153><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and Egypt, <S%G125><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> their Lord <S%G2962><s%> was crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

And those from the peoples <S%G2992><s%> and tribes <S%G5443><s%> and tongues <S%G1100><s%> and nations <S%G1484><s%> [will] look <S%G991><s%> at their dead <S%G4430><s%> bodies <S%G4430><s%> for three <S%G5140><s%> and a half <S%G2255><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and will not permit <S%G863><s%> their dead <S%G4430><s%> bodies <S%G4430><s%> to be laid <S%G5087><s%> in a tomb. <S%G3418><s%>

And those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%> [will] rejoice <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them and make <S%G2165><s%> merry; <S%G2165><s%> and they will send <S%G3992><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> to one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> tormented <S%G928><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> the three <S%G5140><s%> and a half <S%G2255><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> the breath <S%G4151><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> into them, and they stood <S%G2476><s%> on their feet; <S%G4228><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> upon those <S%G3588><s%> who were beholding <S%G2334><s%> them.

And they heard <S%G191><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Come <S%G305><s%> up here. <S%G5602><s%>" And they went <S%G305><s%> up into heaven <S%G3772><s%> in the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and their enemies <S%G2190><s%> beheld <S%G2334><s%> them.

And in that hour <S%G5610><s%> there was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and a tenth <S%G1182><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> fell; <S%G4098><s%> and seven <S%G2033><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%> people <S%G3686><s%> <S%G444><s%> were killed <S%G615><s%> in the earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and the rest <S%G3062><s%> were terrified <S%G1719><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
The second <S%G1208><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is past; <S%G565><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is coming <S%G2064><s%> quickly. <S%G5035><s%>

And the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded; <S%G4537><s%> and there arose <S%G1096><s%> loud <S%G3173><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> has become <S%G1096><s%> [the kingdom] of our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and of His Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and He will reign <S%G936><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>"

And the twenty-four elders, <S%G4245><s%> who sit <S%G2521><s%> on their thrones <S%G2362><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on their faces <S%G4383><s%> and worshiped <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "We give <S%G2168><s%> Thee thanks, <S%G2168><s%> O Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> who art <S%G1510><s%> and who <S%G3588><s%> wast, <S%G1510><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> Thou hast taken <S%G2983><s%> Thy great <S%G3173><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and hast begun to reign. <S%G936><s%>

"And the nations <S%G1484><s%> were enraged, <S%G3710><s%> and Thy wrath <S%G3709><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and the time <S%G2540><s%> [came] for the dead <S%G3498><s%> to be judged, <S%G2919><s%> and [the time] to give <S%G1325><s%> their reward <S%G3408><s%> to Thy bond-servants the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and to the saints <S%G40><s%> and to those <S%G3588><s%> who fear <S%G5399><s%> Thy name, <S%G3686><s%> the small <S%G3398><s%> and the great, <S%G3173><s%> and to destroy <S%G1311><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who destroy <S%G1311><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>"

And the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened; <S%G455><s%> and the ark <S%G2787><s%> of His covenant <S%G1242><s%> appeared <S%G3708><s%> in His temple, <S%G3485><s%> and there were flashes <S%G796><s%> of lightning <S%G796><s%> and sounds <S%G5456><s%> and peals <S%G1027><s%> of thunder <S%G1027><s%> and an earthquake <S%G4578><s%> and a great <S%G3173><s%> hailstorm. <S%G5464><s%>
